titles.title: A bill to designate Union Station in Washington, DC, as "Harry S. Truman Union Station".
A bill to designate Union Station in Washington, DC, as "Harry S. Truman Union Station".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill designates Union Station, located at 40 Massachusetts Avenue, NE., Washington, DC, as the "Harry S. Truman Union Station."
